question: “The Empty Room” is being penned by which renowned writer?
explanation: DSC Prize for South Asian Literature-2019 was announced recently at the London School of Economics & Political Science. Three out of the six books that made the cut were debut works — “The Far Field” by Indian writer Madhuri Vijay, “The Empty Room” by Sadia Abbas and “99 Nights in Logar” by Jamil Jan Kochai.
